testsuite.name: college.spb.at.employeemanager.service.DepartmentServiceTest

testcase.name: Should throw exception when updating department that does not exist
Should fetch department by id when department exists
Should throw exception when deleting department that does not exist
Should update department successfully when department exists
Should throw exception when department by id does not exist
